name: Just the Two of Us!
description:
Just the Two of Us is a 2D platformer game where you impersonate two characters, Ram and Case! Switch between the two of them to alternate between their abilities to progress through all the levels. 

Game Controls Keyboard:
  • A or left arrow: move left
  • D or right arrow: move right
  • Space bar or W or up arrow: jump (press twice for Ram's double-jump)
  • Shift: Case's dash
  • Mouse left click or ctrl: switch character
  • R: restarts the level
  • Esc: pause game
Controller:
  • Left joystick or D-pad: control left and right movements
  • A (Xbox) or CROSS (PlayStation): jump (press twice for Ram's double-jump)
  • X (Xbox) or SQUARE (PlayStation): switch character
  • RB (Xbox) or R1 (PlayStation): Case's dash
  • SELECT: restart the level
  • START: pause game
Notes

This is our project prototype version! This alpha release's goal is to help players understand the game's fundamental mechanics and experience the fast-paced gameplay rhythm that we wanted to achieve.

We're planning some gameplay -  graphical - narrative improvements for a more polished and complete final release :)

Installation instructions Windows
  1. Download the Windows version
  2. Unzip the folder
  3. Start JustTheTwoOfUs.exe
MacOS
  1. Download the MacOS version
  2. Unzip the folder
  3. Run JustTheTwoOfUs.app

Have fun playing!
